PersonalStatement.text: Aaron Martin, born on 1982-07-13, is a Female based in Ashleyview, Papua New Guinea. She is Single and holds Ghanaian nationality. Currently working at Ferguson, Yang and Russell.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Crawford Inc from 2014 to 2017.
Senior HR Manager at Ferguson, Yang and Russell, 2018 to present.
